definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: used in lapping Ju Jdg 7:5; cleaving to the palate ([[חֵק]]), in thirst La 4:4, so as to produce dumbness Job 29:10 (‖[[קוֹל נֶחְבָּא]]), Ps 137:6, Ez Eze 3:26 (‖[[נֶאֱלַם]]); cleaving to jaws ([[מַלְקוֹחַ]]) Ps 22:16; [[בַּצָּמָא נׇשָָׁתָּה]] ´[[ל]] Is 41:17 their tongue for thirst is parched; [[תִּמַּק בְּפִיהֶם]] ´[[לְ]] Zec 14:12 (of ´[[י]]'s judgment); a choice morsel is held ´[[תַּחַת ל]] Job 20:12 (fig. of mischief), cf. Ps 10:7 (ready to be uttered), Ps 66:17 (‖[[פֶּה]]), Ct So 4:11.
